root: ^Ah, it seems I have been found and caught.
^You are quite a perceptive human to have found me, a trait I can appreciate.
^But pray tell, why do you hunt me with such vigor?
^Perhaps your mind is filled with...indecent thoughts? And, now that you've caught me, you'll...you'll...
^...Nay, I cannot give up this hat.
^For if I were to give it to you then I would be left naked.
^To ask such a thing of a lady, you must be quite indecent.
^We Centaur respect only a warriors strength, and if you wish to take from me my article then come! Have at thee!
